message: Let's be fair. You get 10% and I'll take the rest.
I think a 60/40 split is fair, considering the inflation we'll both be facing.
I'm willing to budge a bit, but I need to get a better deal than a 40/60 split. Let's go with 65/35.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. Let's go with a 55/45 split.  We can't keep rejecting each other and lose even more money to inflation.
